item.title: pyFPGA
item.description: PyFPGA is a Python Class for vendor-independent FPGA development. It allows using a single project file and programmatically executing synthesis, implementation, generation of bitstream and/or transference to supported boards. The workflow is command-line centric. It’s friendly with Version Control Systems and Continuous Integration (CI). Allows reproducibility and repeatability. Consumes fewer system resources than GUI based workflows. Also, some command-line helpers are provided, for quick tests or small projects.
